item.title: Derrick Kardos, Graphic Designer on ‘Black Swan,’ and ‘The Departed,’ Dies at 53
item.description: Mentored by Christine Vachon and Thérèse de Prez, he also worked on ‘Go Fish,’ ‘Kids,’ ‘Summer of Sam,’ ‘The Manchurian Candidate’ and ‘American Gangster.’
